title: After being demoted and forced to retire, mRNA researcher wins Nobel
description: Katalin Karikó and Drew Weissman awarded Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

title: Paint drops form “fried egg” patterns if concentration, temp is just right
description: Key insights into influential factors could lead to better control of drying process.

title: SBF trial to begin as judge says he faces “very long sentence” if convicted
description: Jury selection tomorrow; seven criminal charges with max sentence of 110 years.

title: Northrop Grumman likely to end its bid for a commercial space station
description: NASA has a lot riding on these initiatives.

title: Tux the cat found after Lyft fiasco dragged on for days, Lyft to pay vet bills
Is Counter-Strike 2’s new match-abandonment penalty too harsh?
description: Players lose significant matchmaking rank points even if the game crashes mid-match.

title: Apple and devs plan software fixes for iPhone 15 Pro overheating issues
description: Apple says patches won't affect performance and that titanium frame isn't to blame.

title: Hyundai recalls 1.6 million gas-powered cars due to potential car fires
description: The problem is an ABS module that can leak brake fluid, causing a short, then fire.

title: Chromebook Plus laptops debut with hardware requirements, exclusive features
description: You may already own a Chromebook Plus device, and new ones release October 8.
